name: durry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cigarette: I'm speaking as an ex-smoker who still has the occasional durry.
More examplesFewer examplesHe hadn’t had a drink or durry for four days.Reduce the places where it is legal to smoke and increase the price, that should get them off the durries.We drank a keg of beer and went through a couple packs of durries.The current presidential candidates all have undesirable traits, and I reckon his liking for a durry is probably the least of them.
